Package main.TradeSystem.Accounts

Class TraderAccount

java.lang.Object
main.TradeSystem.Accounts.TraderAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Account
public class TraderAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements Account
Represents a trader account

    • TraderAccount

      public TraderAccount​(java.lang.String traderId) throws java.io.IOException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      For accessing actions that a trader can do
      Parameters:
      traderId - the id of the trader
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if database file has issues
      UserNotFoundException - if this trader doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - if this user isn't a trader or if the account is frozen

    • lendItem

      public void lendItem​(java.lang.String secondUserName, java.util.Date firstMeeting, java.util.Date secondMeeting, java.lang.String meetingLocation, int lendItemIndex) throws UserNotFoundException, TradableItemNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      1-way Trade Method: logged-in user giving an item to another user
      Parameters:
      secondUserName - username of the want-to-trade with user
      firstMeeting - Date of the first meeting
      secondMeeting - Date of the second meeting
      meetingLocation - Location of both meetings
      lendItemIndex - index of the item that will be lent
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - userId not found
      TradableItemNotFoundException - tradable item not found
      AuthorizationException - user isn't a trader
      CannotTradeException - trading restrictions

    • borrowItem

      public void borrowItem​(java.lang.String secondUserName, java.util.Date firstMeeting, java.util.Date secondMeeting, java.lang.String meetingLocation, int borrowItemIndex) throws UserNotFoundException, TradableItemNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      1-way Trade Method: logged-in user wants an item from another user
      Parameters:
      secondUserName - username of the want-to-trade with user
      firstMeeting - Date of the first meeting
      secondMeeting - Date of the second meeting
      meetingLocation - Location of both meetings
      borrowItemIndex - index of the item that will be borrowed
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - userId not found
      TradableItemNotFoundException - tradable item not found
      AuthorizationException - user isn't a trader
      CannotTradeException - trading restrictions

    • trade

      public void trade​(java.lang.String traderName, java.util.Date firstMeeting, java.util.Date secondMeeting, java.lang.String meetingLocation, int inventoryItemIndex, int traderInventoryItemIndex) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, TradableItemNotFoundException, CannotTradeException
      For making a two way trade
      Parameters:
      traderName - the user wanting to be traded with
      firstMeeting - first meeting time
      secondMeeting - second meeting time
      meetingLocation - where to meet
      inventoryItemIndex - for getting the item in the inventory
      traderInventoryItemIndex - for getting the item in the other person's inventory
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - userId not found
      TradableItemNotFoundException - tradable item not found
      AuthorizationException - user isn't a trader
      CannotTradeException - trading restrictions

    • confirmTrade

      public boolean confirmTrade​(java.lang.String tradeID) throws AuthorizationException, TradeNotFoundException, CannotTradeException, UserNotFoundException
      Confirms an accepted trade took place outside of the program
      Parameters:
      tradeID - id of the trade
      Returns:
      true if the trade was successfully confirmed
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - userId not found
      AuthorizationException - user isn't a trader
      CannotTradeException - trading restrictions
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade isn't found

    • rejectTrade

      Rejects a requested trade
      Parameters:
      tradeID - id of the trade
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - user isn't a trader
      TradeNotFoundException - trade wasn't found

    • editTrade

      public void editTrade​(java.lang.String tradeID, java.util.Date firstMeeting, java.util.Date secondMeeting, java.lang.String meetingLocation, int inventoryItemIndex, int traderInventoryItemIndex) throws CannotTradeException, TradeNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, TradableItemNotFoundException
      edits the trade object
      Parameters:
      tradeID - id of the trade
      firstMeeting - first meeting date object
      secondMeeting - second meeting date object
      meetingLocation - String of the meeting location
      inventoryItemIndex - index of the user's trade item
      traderInventoryItemIndex - index of the trader's trade item
      Throws:
      CannotTradeException - if the trade is not allowed
      AuthorizationException - if the user cannot access this trade
      TradableItemNotFoundException - couldn't find the item
      UserNotFoundException - if the user isn't found
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade isn't found
